Sentencas: In this paper, attention is paid to the application of such a method of vacuum physical vapor deposition (PVD) as magnetron sputtering for fabrication of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) materials and structures.
Titulo: Application of PVD methods to solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is shown that the YSZ (yttria-stabilized zirconia) electrolyte and Ni-YSZ anode layers with required thickness, structure and composition can be effectively formed by PVD methods.
Titulo: Application of PVD methods to solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The influence of parameters of pulsed power magnetron discharge on the deposition rate and the microstructure of the obtained YSZ electrolyte films were investigated.
Titulo: Application of PVD methods to solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is shown that the deposition rate of the oxide layers by magnetron sputtering can be significantly increased by using asymmetric bipolar power magnetrons, which creates serious prerequisites for applying this method on the industrial scale.
Titulo: Application of PVD methods to solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Porous Ni-YSZ anode films were obtained by reactive co-sputtering of Ni and Zr-Y targets and subsequent reduction in the H-2 atmosphere at a temperature of 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Application of PVD methods to solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Ni-YSZ films comprised small grains and pores of tens of nanometers.
Titulo: Application of PVD methods to solid oxide fuel cells
